attributes.action: make it a compulsary custodial prison sentence for politicians who lie to or mislead the public or parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: politicians who deliberately or by ommission lie to or mislead the public or parliament.should be imprisoned for a defined period.too many are caught lying but are not proceeded against claiming parliamentary priviledge

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
